1.1.name: wordpress/pirkei-avos
1.1.description:
This is a plugin for web-savvy yidden who would rather enrich their blogging experience with Truth and Torah than with weird showbiz pomp. The plugin quotes at random from the chapters of our holy fathers, allowing frumer bloggers to enrich and test their knowledge of this most hallowed and ancient tradition of Pirkei Avos. Plus, it will help you feel a lot better about being on the web in the first place. For heteirim and other accoutrements, please consult your local orthodox rabbi.

-Bennyp

P.S. Email for great shabbes accomodations in Jerusalem.
